about_the_game:
This DLC includes the following items:

1. Kassandra 1-Bloodmoon x1
2. Lili 5-Star x1
3. Moss 5-Star x1
4. Dark Iron x10,000
5. Soul x5,000
6. Hero Medal x150


[Mercenary Introduction]
1. Kassandra
Though Petyr takes a seat at the table of the Holy Church, he is a follower of the dark arts - a dark wizard with an evil heart and soul. Yet his mastery of dark forces is lacking, as evidenced by his inabilty to complete any mission given to him by his superiors.

Skill 1 - Circle of Silence
Cast forth a Silencing Field under the feet of the Boss, or a random enemy if not in a Boss Fight, dealing Light damage for 931% Attack to enemies in the area while silencing them for 5 sec.

Skill 2 - Witchery Orbs
Fire orbs to 3 random enemy targets which deals damage for 133% Attack; The enemy gets all 5 different states which are Burnt, Bleeding, Paralyzed, Poisoned and Scourged for 5 sec.

Skill 3 - Mysterious Orbs
Shoot a damage orb to the enemy leader which deals damage for 100% Attack to all enemies on the way, bounces 4 times; shoot a healing orb to Main character which restore Health equal to 35% of Kassandra's Attack to all allies on the way, bounces 4 times.

Skill 4 - Immunity Shield
Summon a magic circle nearby to give all allies in the circle an effect to immune control for 8 sec.


2. Lili
A young girl found in the forest on the verge of death. Though her memory of everything prior to that moment is gone, her cheerful and lively personality keep her from dwelling on her past. Naive, sweet and trusting, the one snippet of her past she is aware of is that she entered the forest looking for Pandora, though she has no idea who Pandora is...

Skill 1 - Group Heal
Channel for 5 sec to restore all allies' health equal to 56% Attack.

Skill 2 - First Aid
At the expense of 5% self health, restore health equal to 100% Attack to the ally with the lowest health percentage.

Skill 3 - Blood-drawing Needle
Fire a syringe at the current target, dealing Light damage equal to 86% Attack while restoring 17% self health and another 5% extra health if target is marked with Scourge.

Skill 4 - Self Sacrifice
Take a deadly strike for the sake of the protagonist at the expense of massive Health loss, and help the protagonist restore Health.


3. Moss
What Moss is, he won't say, and where he comes from, no one seems to know. This acolyte of the Holy Order has the gift of the gab, an eloquent and persuasive speaker who values diplomacy and considered discourse over weapon skills and bloodshed, though he is fully capable of defending himself if need be.

Skill 1 - Confusing
Charm the target, dealing Light damage equal to 420% Attack. If the target is marked with Scourge, restore heath equal to 78% Attack to all allies.

Skill 2 - Heal
Heal the ally with the lowest health, restoring health equal to 52% Attack.

Skill 3 - Coquette
Reduce Attack Speed of the enemies in the front row by 40% for 6 sec.

Skill 4 - Return
Boost other allies' Attack by 30% for 5 sec when receiving healing.

This DLC includes the following items:

1. Kassandra 1-Bloodmoon x1
2. Lili 5-Star x1
3. Moss 5-Star x1
4. Dark Iron x10,000

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Mojave 10
  • Processor: Intel Core-i3 or faster processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Mojave 10
  • Processor: Intel Core-i5 or faster processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Popular light mercenaries are gathering here!
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
